filesystem_mcp_client.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) client that provides file system operations through stdio transport. This tool enables reading, writing, and managing files and directories on the local file system with configurable root paths for security.

root_paths.description: Array of root directory paths that the filesystem client can access

timeout_seconds.description: Request timeout in seconds for MCP operations

baidu_search_mcp_client.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) client that provides AI-powered search capabilities through Baidu's AppBuilder platform via Server-Sent Events (SSE) transport. This tool enables intelligent web search and information retrieval.

api_key.description: Baidu AppBuilder API key for authentication

endpoint_url.description: Base URL for the Baidu AppBuilder MCP service

timeout_minutes.description: Request timeout in minutes for search operations

mcp_client_initializer.description: Utility tool for initializing and managing MCP (Model Context Protocol) clients with different transport mechanisms including stdio and SSE (Server-Sent Events).

client_type.description: Type of MCP client to initialize

transport_config.description: Configuration object for the transport layer

command.description: Command to execute for stdio transport (e.g., 'npx')

sse_endpoint.description: SSE endpoint path with query parameters

unit.description: Time unit for timeout (seconds, minutes, hours)
